evict.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to tell someone legally that they must leave the house they are living in
evict.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: They refused to leave and were forcibly evicted  (=evicted by force).
They were unable to pay the rent, and were evicted from their home.
evict.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to legally force someone to leave the house they are living in or land they are living on
evict.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: They were evicted from their home for not paying the rent.
